software.name: elog
software.custom_start_script:
PID_FILE=/tmp/pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh
/home/app//local/sbin/elogd &
pid=$!
touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
echo $pid >/tmp/pid
wait
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete

exit
software.custom_install_script:
cd /home/app/src
env ROOT=/home/app PREFIX=/../local HAVE_SSL=0 make install
